details.title: What is Food Waste
details.description: A colorful cartoon video introducing the concept of food waste. The video will show examples of food that gets thrown away and explain why it happens (e.g., buying too much, not eating leftovers). Use simple examples like throwing away half-eaten fruit or bread that goes stale.

exam_detail_items: Eating all the food on your plate
Throwing away food we could still eat
exam_details.answer: Throwing away food we could still eat

exam_details.exam_detail_title: What can we do instead of wasting food?
exam_detail_items: Save it for later or share it
Hide it in the fridge and forget about it
exam_details.answer: Save it for later or share it

exam_details.exam_detail_title: Throwing away food we could still eat Why do we waste food?
exam_detail_items: Because we buy more food than we need
exam_details.answer: Because we buy more food than we need
